Mind-Blowing Space Facts

Discover the incredible truths about our universe

üî≠ ‚úï
‚òÄÔ∏è

1 Million Earths

You could fit one million Earths inside the Sun. The Sun accounts for 99.86% of all mass in our solar system.

üåå

Infinite Stars

There are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on all of Earth's beaches combined.

üï≥Ô∏è

Black Hole Giants

The largest known black hole, TON 618, has a mass of 66 billion suns and is 40 billion km across.

üåô

Moon Drift

The Moon is drifting away from Earth at a rate of 3.8 cm per year‚Äîabout the same speed your fingernails grow.

‚ö°

Neutron Stars

A sugar-cube-sized amount of neutron star material would weigh about 1 billion tons on Earth.

üëÅÔ∏è

Cosmic Light

The light we see from stars today left those stars thousands or even millions of years ago.

üî≠
